newsitem.title: USA: N.Y. Fed Press Briefing - August 22.
newsitem.headline: N.Y. Fed Press Briefing - August 22.

text.p: The Federal Reserve had no large one-day net misses in its reserve projections in the latest week, a Fed spokeswoman said.
As for the pattern of borrowing, all of the adjustment borrowing in the week was done by the small banks. There was no borrowing by the large regionals or the money center banks.
The high in natural float was about $700 million on Tuesday, while the low was a bit under $350 million on Thursday.
Transportation float averaged a bit under $90 million per day in the week, with the high on Tuesday at a bit under $250 million primarily due to aircraft mechanical problems in Cleveland.
